page.title: 11"Kelso in Bloom"
page.content: In recent years,{Kelso}has had a very impressive record in the{"Britain in {Bloom"}competition. The parks, gardens and other flower displays in the town are always impressive and beautifully laid out. This is mainly due to the dedicated work of the{Roxburgh {District Council Parks Department.}All the flowers are home-grown and five gardeners are employed to do the work. The displays take 2-3 days to plant and great care is taken over their arrangement.{Kelso}recently won the {"Best Small Burgh in Scotland"}prize and also was runner-up to the{"Best {Small Town in Britain."}It also won 3rd prize in the{"Europe in Bloom" competition. The only annoying problem the{Parks Dept.}faces is vandalism. Overall, however, the displays are appreciated by locals and visitors alike.
